IRS990EZ.PrimaryExemptPurposeTxt: THE PURPOSE OF THE OPTIMIST CLUB OF WEATHEFORD IS TO DEVELOP OPTIMISM AS A PHILOSOPHY OF LIFE UTILIZING THE TENETS OF THE OPTIMIST CREED; TO PROMOTE AN ACTIVE INTEREST IN GOOD GOVERNMENT AND CIVIC AFFAIRS; TO INSPIRE RESPECT FOR THE LAW; TO PROMOTE PATRIOTISM AND WORK FOR INTERNATIONAL ACCORD AND FRIENDSHIP AMONG ALL PEOPLE; TO AID AND ENCOURAGE THE DEVELOPMENT OF YOUTH IN THE BELIEF THAT THE GIVING OF ONE'S SELF IN SERVICE TO OTHERS WILL ADVANCE THE WELL-BEING OF HUMANKIND, COMMUNITY LIFE AND THE WORLD. THE WEATHERFORD OPTIMIST CLUB IS INVOLVED IN PROMOTING, BUILDING UP, AND ENCOURAGING THE YOUTH OF OUR COMMUNITY. THIS IS DONE THROUGH THE WEATHERFORD OPTIMIST CLUB'S CONTRIBUTION AND/OR DEVELOPMENT OF THE FOLLOWING PROGRAMS: 1. PEE WEE FOOTBALL PROGRAM: THE WEATHERFORD OPTIMIST CLUB ORGANIZES AND PROMOTES THIS PROGRAM YEARLY 2. ANNUAL DONATION TO THE WEATHERFORD COLLEGE POLICE DEPARTMENT - SAFE HALLOWEEN EVENT 3. ANNUAL AWARD OF WEATHERFORD COLLEGE SCHOLARSHIP 4. MONTHLY RECOGNITION OF

THE PURPOSE OF THE OPTIMIST CLUB OF WEATHEFORD IS TO DEVELOP OPTIMISM AS A PHILOSOPHY OF LIFE UTILIZING THE TENETS OF THE OPTIMIST CREED; TO PROMOTE AN ACTIVE INTEREST IN GOOD GOVERNMENT AND CIVIC AFFAIRS; TO INSPIRE RESPECT FOR THE LAW; TO PROMOTE PATRIOTISM AND WORK FOR INTERNATIONAL ACCORD AND FRIENDSHIP AMONG ALL PEOPLE; TO AID AND ENCOURAGE THE DEVELOPMENT OF YOUTH IN THE BELIEF THAT THE GIVING OF ONE'S SELF IN SERVICE TO OTHERS WILL ADVANCE THE WELL-BEING OF HUMANKIND, COMMUNITY LIFE AND THE WORLD. THE WEATHERFORD OPTIMIST CLUB IS INVOLVED IN PROMOTING, BUILDING UP, AND ENCOURAGING THE YOUTH OF OUR COMMUNITY. THIS IS DONE THROUGH THE WEATHERFORD OPTIMIST CLUB'S CONTRIBUTION AND/OR DEVELOPMENT OF THE FOLLOWING PROGRAMS: 1. PEE WEE FOOTBALL PROGRAM: THE WEATHERFORD OPTIMIST CLUB ORGANIZES AND PROMOTES THIS PROGRAM YEARLY 2. ANNUAL DONATION TO THE WEATHERFORD COLLEGE POLICE DEPARTMENT - SAFE HALLOWEEN EVENT 3. ANNUAL AWARD OF WEATHERFORD COLLEGE SCHOLARSHIP 4. MONTHLY RECOGNITION OF OPTIMIST BOY/GIRL OF THE MONTH FOR THE WEATHERFORD MIDDLE SCHOOLS AND THE YOUNG TEXAN/TEXANNE STUDENTS IN WEATHERFORD HIGH SCHOOL FOR EXCELLENCE IN ACADEMICS AND SCHOLASTICS 5. ANNUAL DONATION TO OPTIMIST JUNIOR WORLD OF GOLF 6. ANNUAL DONATION TO HOBY FOUNDATION 7. ANNUAL DONATION TO THE OPTIMIST INTERNATIONAL FOUNDATION 8. ANNUAL DONATION TO THE WEATHERFORD LITTLE LEAGUE 9. ANNUAL DONATION TO THE TEXAS PYTHIAN HOME 10. ANNUAL DONATION TO THE VICTIM AWARENESS THROUGH ART (PARKER COUNTY ATTORNEY OFFICE) 11. ANNUAL DONATION TO SPECIAL OLYMPICS 12. ANNUAL DONAITON TO WISD FOUNDATION 13. ANNUAL DONATION TO WEATHERFORD HIGH SCHOOL PROJECT GRADUATION 14. ANNUAL DONATION TO THE PARKER COUNTY LIVESTOCK IMPROVEMENT ASSOCIATION 15. ANNUAL DONATION TO PARKER COUNTY REACT 16. ANNUAL DONATION TO NORTHSIDE BAPTIST YOUTH PROGRAM 17. SUPPLY RODEO FLAGS FOR BUSINESSES DURING THE WEATHERFORD SHERIFF'S POSSE RODEO 18. PARTICIPATE IN THE COMMUNICATION CONTEST FOR DEAF AND HARD OF HEARING PROGRAM 19. PARTICIPATE IN THE WEATHERFORD PEACH FESTIVAL 20. ANNUAL DONATION TO THE CAST FOR KIDS PROGRAM
